summary: Implemented a new Zurich-focused landing page component and added a reachable route at /paarberatung-zuerich using the global Layout. SEO metadata and sitemap entry were added, and the page was explicitly kept out of the main navigation. Due to file truncation, some content/section and CTA repetition acceptance criteria cannot be fully verified from the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Page includes distinct sections for (1) typical couple challenges, (2) how online counseling works at PaarWeg, (3) PaarWeg attitude/approach, (4) CTA invitation to an initial non-binding first contact.
missing_requirements.reason: The added landing page file is truncated; only the Hero section and the beginning of a 'Challenges' section are visible. The required additional sections and their distinct structure cannot be confirmed from the provided diff excerpt.

missing_requirements.requirement: Landing page includes a prominent CTA button above the fold and at least one CTA repetition near the bottom; at least one CTA goes to an existing conversion path (/kontakt and/or https://calendly.com/paarweg-info).
missing_requirements.reason: The hero CTA button to Calendly is visible, but the file is truncated and does not show whether a CTA is repeated near the bottom.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated internal project tracking metadata (project_state.json) describing feature requests and statuses.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask to introduce or modify repository/project tracking state files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added a repository-wide 'frontend-file-summaries.txt' describing many pages and features beyond the Zurich landing page.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for a new landing page, routing, SEO metadata, and sitemap update; it does not request documentation/summary file updates.
